newsitem.title: USA: Central Reserve Life in capital talks.
newsitem.headline: Central Reserve Life in capital talks.

text.p: Central Reserve Life Corp said on Tuesday that it is in talks consider various investment and partnership proposals to strengthen its position in the health insurance industry.

With the assistance of its investment bankers, Central Reserve said it is in talks with companies interested in providing its Central Reserve Life Insurance Co subsidiary with a means of returning adjusted capital to required levels, including an acquisition of the unit.
No agreement has been reached, the company said in a statement.
